text: Ni shuo:“Nandao women yao she an la er qiqiu yixie dui women ji wuyi ye wu hai de [ouxiang] ma? Zai an la yindao women hou, nandao women neng xiang bei emomen you ru qitu er zai da dishang miwang de ren ma? Ta de huobanmen jiao ta lai zunxing zhengdao [shi shuo]:“Ni dao women zheli lai ba!” Ni shuo:“An la de zhengdao [zhu] cai shi zhenzheng de zhengdao. Women yi fengming guishun zhong shijie de zhu [an la].”
